title: 820-3437 quick question about keyboard trackpad
message:
Just want to double check something. Currently waiting for trackpad flex cable to be delivered next week as i've run out
Have a macbook here for liquid damage fixed everything it seems, was dead. but keyboard and trackpad doesn't work only afer boot. it works beforehand. that's the cable right?

title: 820-3437 quick question about keyboard trackpad
message: Could be cable, trackpad, or keyboard. If cable was corroded, depends which end was corroded.

title: 820-3437 quick question about keyboard trackpad
message:
Before OSX (i.e. Boot Menu), trackpad/keyboard work through USB way.
Once logged into OSX, SPI communication is enabled.

Try first known good working trackpad board/flex.
If still not working into OSX, checl all traces and resistors SPI related.
Also check I/O signals for U4810.
